messages.message: This is going to be so cool!
Let me know when you are ready! üôÇ
It's a great day! Isn't it?
...or at least we can make it a great day! üôÇ
But before... I have a question...
Because I can't seem to remember... üòÖ
BTW, I do you want me to speak —Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–∏?
...but, you gotta promise to not cheat! ü§ì
I'll give you a few missions.

At my desk, by the window, there is something wrapped in newspaper. Get it, and put it on your bag (you might need it later. Exciting, right? üôÇ).
PS. you can get a chocolate from the can too! üôÇ

Awesome!!
You just finished your first mission! üôÇ
ok ok, that's it for now!
I'll be back later with more missions... be ready!! üòâ

Hi again!!
I hope your day was awesome! üòé
I have another mission for you!
When you are on your way home, I need you to get something for me...

Take the LRT, get off at the KLCC station and move towards home as usually. After you climb the stairs, entering Suria Mall, look to the left, there is this place called `Lysha Flora`. Ask about a delivery for you. üôÇ
Only continue if you already picked it up! No cheating!! üôÇ
You are not cheating, are you?

So, now you can go get your dinner in ISETAN.
But no sweeties for today!! üòõ
As soon as you get home, let me know...
Awesome!! So you know what to do! TIP: Use what you got in the office in the morning! üòä
3, Because you like this number (remember my mind reading magic? üé©)
White and Red, because they are your favourites.
I hope I could make you smile... üôÇ

messages.answer: I saw social engineering in action üòä thank you, you made me happy today
messages.message: How do you feel right now?

Awesome!! I'm curious!
Your mission now is to send me a picture. üòä
Yay! Enjoy your dinner and the rest of your night!
It's a beautiful day, isn't it? üòä
I sure did enjoy planning it. üôÇ
You told me more than once, that every day should/could be special.
I'm here to make sure every single day is special for you.

What do you say?
Ready for a special day?
Of course I have another mission for you...
this one will be to sweeten your day üôÇ
well... you will know soon enough. For now, all you have to do is go to office üòâ
yes, I know, office this week is not fun...
but it can be our secret...
we are going to have fun anyways.
we are going to smile anyways.
we are going to be happy anyways. üôÇ

messages.action1: I have it and I love it!
messages.message: Once you get to your desk. Crouch and look under it! üòâ
Now I'll leave you focus on work! üòÖ
and have fun at the meetings... üòõ
(Best thing about not being here today.)
Yes, I know. You missed me!
It's a gift. And a curse. üòé
Ha! I shouldn't start with the questions...
I know, I forgot! Can't help it! üôÇ
As you said before, silence with someone you are comfortable with is not akward. üôÇ
I mean, I'll get back to planning tomorrow...
Let's see what I can come up with! üôÇ
Enjoy the rest of your evening!
(leaving with a very nice Brazilian goodbye)
I hope this week is being fun for you! üôÇ
btw... did you notice the time I'm buzzing you?
It's all going to be AWESOME!
So go out there, and have an amazing day!

Oh, and listen to
`IF TODAY WAS YOUR LAST DAY!!! - NICKLEBACK`.
Did you have a happy day? üôÇ
some days ago we were talking...
about what we want for the future.
what you said, is that you just want to be happy. üôÇ
I guess that's what we all want, right?
You know what makes you happy...
And you probably know what can make you happy starting now...
Actually, I never needed to tell you, you already knew it. üòè
...because of the gift and the curse... üòõ
but perhaps that's not a bad thing...
perhaps that's what makes us great.
even though it doesn't always work out
we should not regret about things we did...
but about things we didn't do.
so, I'm not saying we have to jump into something fast...
but I would like to know...
Is it ok if I ask you out sometime? üòè
It's been awesome talking to you today! üôÇ
I wish you an amazing night!
I hope that this week has been good for you. üôÇ
And perhaps I had something to do with it‚Ä¶ ‚ò∫Ô∏è
There were a lot of mixed feelings.
But there was one thing I realized every day more.
Which is how I feel about you. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
But probably you want me to spell it out.
Don‚Äôt want to say it all at once.
What is the fun on that? üôÇ
I think you should treat yourself with something nice today‚Ä¶
What about going to work a little bit later‚Ä¶ üòä
Because, ISETAN cake place only opens at 10‚Ä¶
And before going to office, hmmm..
I‚Äôd love to see which one you chose! üôÇ
Why did you pick this one?
I didn‚Äôt want to be predictable, so I came earlier!
But really fast, I‚Äôll be gone soon, won‚Äôt bother you for long! üòä
Just wanted to know how was lunch. üôÇ
Hope you have fun during the rest of the day‚Ä¶
You did ask me about this app before‚Ä¶
I never gave you many details.
On how it started, why and when I‚Äôm writing it all
Maybe I am writing it live
Maybe I wrote it so long ago
Or maybe I developed the app to write in my behalf
So I don‚Äôt have to do it
I had this idea a couple of weeks ago
I knew I was going to miss you during this time I was out
I did feel you were going to miss me too
So, my idea was not to build an app
But to build an amazing week for you...
While being in the other side of the world
Right now, this whole day I‚Äôve been writing from the plane from Taipei to SF.
Talked to you an hour ago over WhatsApp
Sending you some weird dessert pictures ‚ò∫Ô∏è
That I bet you were really interested!
I wish you a great end of day!
That‚Äôs how I‚Äôm picturing you right now ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Hope they are bringing more joy to your days‚Ä¶ üòä
Knowing that you are happy, do make me happy. üòä
I want to wish you a beautiful day!
And tell you I‚Äôll be thinking about you.
Whenever you feel bad, stressed, bored
You can remember me telling you something funny
You probably have a few good ones‚Ä¶ ‚ò∫Ô∏è
You must be wondering the whole week
Maybe there was a better time for it
With everything that‚Äôs been going on...
But I felt like this should be the time
I have things to tell you‚Ä¶
And I‚Äôll do it today, but later, because right now you are probably still in the office...
I'll buzz you a bit later. üòä
Have a great time until then üòâ
Right now, I‚Äôm still in the airplane going to SF‚Ä¶
But for you, it‚Äôs already been a whole week
Since we said goodbye in front of your building...
But for me, it‚Äôs only been yesterday.
(Yes, I‚Äôm traveling through time‚Ä¶ and you don‚Äôt believe on it yet? üòä)
After you told me you would miss me
But I was feeling the same
And looked back a few times
You stood there for a while
I still don‚Äôt know why I didn‚Äôt
I wanted for this week to happen before
I started talking about it yesterday.
Sorry, I always have so much to tell‚Ä¶
Last time we went to Din Tai Fung, you told me I keep on asking personal questions‚Ä¶
That you don‚Äôt usually talk about even with friends that you have had for years
Truth is that I‚Äôm interested in knowing everything about you. üòä
Because time doesn‚Äôt mean anything to me.
It‚Äôs like I know you for a long time‚Ä¶
Not sure how to explain it‚Ä¶
I did see something special about you
I was sure after we got closer‚Ä¶
Not sure exactly when it started
But it‚Äôs been growing every day more
I can probably list them all
But for today, that‚Äôs what I wanted you to know.¬†
I fought against it for a while,
But then I realized there was no point‚Ä¶
Listen to ‚ÄúTrying not to love you‚Äù - Nickleback (Ok)
I‚Äôm going to leave with this for today.
Russian was always intriguing for me‚Ä¶
I guess I told you this story already
I first started learning it in 2010
Because the language was intriguing and different
Because I didn‚Äôt know anybody that could speak it
Because I wanted to go to Russia one day üòä
I believe experience changes when we can speak the language
That‚Äôs one of the reasons I tried a few languages‚Ä¶
So I studied it for around 3 months
Stopped it the first time I travelled without a date to come back, for 5 months
Russia was in my wish list
I heard so many awesome things about the place before
And before coming back home, I wondered whether I should go there from China or not
But ended up not going, for some reason (I guess money was over‚Ä¶ üòä)
During the trip, I got to practice 2 sentences with a Russian girl I met in Vietnam
I was happy I still remembered something‚Ä¶üòä
Ok‚Ä¶ anyways, the app doesn‚Äôt support different options yet‚Ä¶ üòä
So you will have to keep with my story üòä
By the time I finally got the chance to go to Russia,
So I had to keep remembering words and sentences‚Ä¶
That‚Äôs because you weren‚Äôt there to show me the places‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm not only learning the language to impress you
But also because it intrigues me
So you may not have realized¬†
Or I think you did already‚Ä¶
You are not the only one learning something from me
But I‚Äôm learning a lot from you
So sorry, I tried to keep it short‚Ä¶
But you see, it‚Äôs too much too tell üòä
It‚Äôs always awesome to see you! üòä
The other day I started talking about the app..
I‚Äôll tell you more about it‚Ä¶ let me know once you are ready üòä
I guess we all have to use our own tools / knowledge / abilities / powers / magic to express ourselves, right?
Maybe this is as you said‚Ä¶
This is the way I chose to express myself
And this one you probably figured out where it came from already‚Ä¶
The code itself is quite interesting though
If you are interested of course. üòä
There is so much more I wanted to do with it
To express everything I wanted to
But there was only this little I could do during this time. üòä
I‚Äôve been writing the messages along development...
Wanted to plan so much more,
But some of the plans in short notice didn‚Äôt work out‚Ä¶
Perhaps I‚Äôll do them moving forward‚Ä¶ üòä
For now, I wish you an awesome Sunday!
